    • 方法详细资料

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             byte[] responseBody)
        从类复制的说明: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        Fired when a request returns successfully, override to handle in your own code
        指定者:
        onSuccess 在类中 AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        statusCode - the status code of the response
        headers - return headers, if any
        responseBody - the body of the HTTP response from the server

      • onFailure

        public void onFailure(int statusCode,
             Header[] headers,
             byte[] responseBody,
             java.lang.Throwable error)
        从类复制的说明: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        Fired when a request fails to complete, override to handle in your own code
        指定者:
        onFailure 在类中 AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        statusCode - return HTTP status code
        headers - return headers, if any
        responseBody - the response body, if any
        error - the underlying cause of the failure

      • onProgress

        public void onProgress(int bytesWritten,
              int totalSize)
        从类复制的说明: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        Fired when the request progress, override to handle in your own code
        覆盖:
        onProgress 在类中 AsyncHttpResponseHandler
        参数:
        bytesWritten - offset from start of file
        totalSize - total size of file

        从类复制的说明: AsyncHttpResponseHandler
